ygData.subject: Re: Odd Behavior from the Maestro of Rancor
ygData.msgSnippet: Geez guys! Its (level/6)*2 + 2 At level 6 its 4 At level 12 its 6 ... At level 48 its 18 Then add 1 hp you get back normally If you are sitting add 1 hp If you
ygData.messageBody:
Geez guys!

Its (level/6)*2 + 2
At level 6 its 4
At level 12 its 6
...
At level 48 its 18

Then add 1 hp you get back normally
If you are sitting add 1 hp
If you are sitting and level 20+ add another 1 hp

So standing level 50s will get 19 back while hymm is playing.
Sitting level 50s will get 21 back while hymm is playing.

I don't know the effect of special instruments.

Razzan got busy at work and now has 80 messages to read. /yell

>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> ok if it is 21 sitting, then 20% it is. ME? test?!? i leave that to the
> experts. i've meant to many times, i ALWAYS forget.
>
> Shada, lazy and forgetful
>
> >
> > From: <kim@...>
> >
> > 36-41 15 standing, 17 sitting
> > 42-47 17 standing, 19 sitting
> > 48-50 19 standing, 21 sitting (I assume)
> >
> > So 20% sounds right. Why don't you buy a normal lute and test
> > it? :)
>
